description: This course will show you how to do client management in Podio and still use Daylite as your CRM. This is a great course for any small business who meets with clients and needs to track prepayments or retainers. Lawyers and coaches would be most interested. You can have the power of Podio right inside of Daylite. The best of both worlds.
title: Client Management in Podio while using Daylite as CRM
